attributes.action: De-criminalise the growing and use of marijuana for personal relaxation & medication
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow people the freedom to grow and use marijuana in the privacy of their own homes. Also to license premises to sell marijuana for on-site use and out sales for personal use, as is done in the Amsterdam coffee shops.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
